import { CalendarIcon, UserIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { ChevronLeftIcon, ChevronRightIcon } from '@heroicons/react/20/solid' import axios from 'axios'; const items = [ { id: 1, title: 'Back End Developer', department: 'Engineering', type: 'Full-time', location: 'Remote' }, { id: 2, title: 'Front End Developer', department: 'Engineering', type: 'Full-time', location: 'Remote' }, { id: 3, title: 'User Interface Designer', department: 'Design', type: 'Full-time', location: 'Remote' }, ] export default function HomePage() { const [blogs, setBlogs] = useState([]); const [users, setUsers] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { document.title = 'NexaraBlog | Ana Sayfa'; const fetchBlogsAndUsers = async () => { try { const getUsers = await axios.get("http://localhost:7007/api/auth"); const getblogs = await axios.get("http://localhost:7007/api/posts"); setBlogs(getblogs.data); setUsers(getUsers.data); } catch (error) { console.error("Error fetching data:", error); } }; fetchBlogsAndUsers(); }, []); const getAuthorName = (uid) => { const user = users.find(user => user.id === uid); return user ? user.name : "Unknown Author"; }; return (
{blogs?.map((blog) => (

{blog?.category?.toUpperCase()}

{blog.title}

Yazar{getAuthorName(blog.uid)}

{blog.date}

{blog.desc}...

))}
Previous Next

97 sonuçtan 1 ile 10 {' '} arası gösteriliyor

Previous 1 2 3 ... 8 9 10 Next
); }
